channel.title: I need help with items(testscape)
channel.description: hello i was wondering can u change the required lvl for an item to use and how like i want to make d hide chaps and vams for 1 def to use not 60 how do i do that?[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 01:34:34 AM[/size][hr][glow=red,2,300]cmon ppl should know[/glow][br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 01:55:12 AM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 02:43:55 AM[/size][hr]bump[br][size=1]Posted at: September 01, 2006, 10:59:11 AM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: I need help with items(testscape)
item.dc:creator: @user123 user123
item.description:
@user123 wrote:

i tried serching for everything but i noticed one thing whenever like an item is called like dragon chain, dragon vams and dragonhide u need all 60 def for all those but the thing is i tried serching in everyfile nothing so how do items get their def setup in properway???but on the other hand in say project16 u dont need def for anyitems so im just wondering how to change only like d hide chaps and vams.
Also i added d hide g and t not long ago and u dont need 60 def to wear that but normal u need 60 def to wear all d hide armors or dragon…so im kinda confused…[br][size=1]Posted at: September 06, 2006, 12:12:10 AM[/size][hr]i got it u just have to change from dragonhide body to dhide body and itll work perfecto!!!

Read full topic
